thoughts.text: The 'generate_image' command generated an image of an octopus. We can now try to use the 'execute_shell' command to display the image on the command line.
thoughts.reasoning: Now that we have generated an image of an octopus, it would be useful to display the image on the command line. We can do this by using the 'execute_shell' command to run a shell command that will display the image on the command line.
